name: Pro/ENGINEER Assembly Instance Accelerator File
summary: Learn about .XAS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: XAS files reduce the amount of time required to retrieve specific assembly instances since Pro/ENGINEER does not have to load the "generic" geometry and all "family table" information first.

description: File created by Pro/ENGINEER, a program used to design manufactured components and processes; contains an instance of an .ASM assembly file, which is a particular parametric definition from a "family table" of assemblies within the ASM file.
